column4: Hi, do you know why display of my notebok sometimes becomes black and also my keyboard is totally blocked?
would help with more information
you are right... so sometimes when I launch picasa on wine... only sometimes, my monitor become black and I cannot do anything... also my keyboard does not work
consider using F-Spot
then, also sometimes, when I try to shutdoen my notebook same effect
F-spot? What do you mean?
photo organiser for linux
yes and compatible i believe with the tagging system
and about my problem? Sometimes it happens when I don't use picasa
no idea
and aboout my shutdown problem? Any idea?
shutdown problem?
yes... sometimes when I sthutdown my notebook display is black and I see hard disk led always on...
what video chipset
other time it happens that when I turn on my notebook does not appear login window and I ahve to force restart
intel GM 852
do you think it can be a driver problem compatibility?
perhaps.
do you know shell command to obtain video chipset information?
lspci, glxinfo
I'll try to find same problem on internet
thanks for your time and F-SPOT suggestion... now I try it!
np
